A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hated this movie\, hated what they did to Luke Skywalker.  He went from hero to zero.  Went from wanting to be a Jedi like his father to saying the Jedi should end.  What idiot thought that was a good idea.  What happened to the optimism and comradery that made the originals.  Expected a lot more from Disney.
